titleStmt.title: A list of the præbendaries of the cathedral church of St. Paul London, appointed by the Lord Bishop of London, to preach upon the holy-days, in the year of our Lord, 1693. at Saint Peter's Church in Cornhil.
titleStmt.author: Compton, Henry, 1632-1713.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: H. London [i.e. Henry Compton Lord Bishop of London].
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
